post.summary: Sends a verification message to the provided credentials.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Request model with a credential value, type, and password.

0: An unexpected error occurred.
1: Credential value and password are required. Please try again.

403.description:
0: Token Validation Failed
4: Could not send a verification message. Please try again later.

429.description: 2: Too many attempts. Please wait a bit.

503.description: 5: Credentials verification operation is unavailable. Please try again later.

It can return a redirect response to www, or a SAML2 response.
Most Apis should not return anything except for Json.
